content: Hi Emma! How did your morning meditation practice go today?
Good morning! I managed 8 minutes today and felt much more centered. The breathing technique you taught me really helps.
That's wonderful progress! Building up gradually is exactly the right approach. See you at our session tomorrow.
Hi Sarah, I wanted to update you on my job applications. I've applied to three wellness companies this week!
That's fantastic news, Michael! Your confidence has really grown. How are you feeling about the transition?
Thank you for the energy clearing session yesterday. I felt such a shift! My sleep was so much better last night.
David, congratulations on hitting your fitness milestone! Your dedication is truly inspiring.
I'm really looking forward to our first session next week. I've filled out the intake form you sent.
